import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from '../../../assets/images/logo.png'; import { useAuthContext } from '../../../contexts/AuthContext'; import styles from './Header.module.css'; export const Header = () => { const { currentUser } = useAuthContext(); return (
  • Movies
  • Series
  • Genres
    • {!currentUser ? <>
  • Login
  • Register
    • : <>
  • Watchlist
  • Logout
    • }
) }
